page.title: 13Health In Bishop Monkton
page.content:
Ripon is the nearest{hospital,} ambulances are based there.
The{mobile clinic}visits the village monthly for ante-natal care,and checks on infants,including their pre-school examination and injections. At school,children receive checks monthly on eyes,ears,and hair cleanliness.A{dentist}visits the school annually.The nearest dentists are at Ripon,which has 14 dentists contained in 5 practices. There are weekly visits by a{Doctor} from a Ripon practice,who collects messages from a central farm,and prescribed medicines are collected from there.Other group practices in Ripon visit the village on call. A {chiropodist }visits the village quarterly to treat pensioners.
